casebody.data:
Michael Thomas ACURIO
v.
Danielle Dickerson CAGE, a/k/a Danielle Dickerson Acurio, a/k/a Danielle Dickerson No. 2018-C-1762 Supreme Court of Louisiana. January 8, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, SECOND CIRCUIT, PARISH OF BOSSIER Writ denied. HUGHES, J., concurs and assigns reasons. Hughes, J., concurring.

Although I concur with the denial of this writ, I continue to believe the original case was wrongly decided. Acknowledgment under oath of a document filed before the marriage is sufficient.
